name: getConfigurableLogDrain
description: Retrieves a Configurable Log Drain. This endpoint must be called with a team AccessToken (integration OAuth2 clients are not allowed). Only log drains owned by the authenticated team can be accessed.

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **branch**: The branch to filter logs by
**configurationId**: The ID of the related integration configuration
**createdAt**: A number containing the date when the log-drain was created in in milliseconds
**environment**: The environment to filter logs by
**headers**: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T
**ownerId**: The unique ID of the team the deployment belongs to
**projectIds**: The ID of the projects the deployment is associated with
**url**: A string with the URL of the log-drain
